name: A Week With Ian Boswell
description:
A Week With Ian Boswell

​
###
​
The first step in your journey to getting faster!

​

If you are in need of any technical help or want to know more about the training terms used in this plan check out the [Wahoo SYSTM Help Center.](https://wahoosystm.com/HelpCenter)

​

Have a more specific question that isn't addressed in the Help Center? Head over to our [forum](https://wahoox.forum.wahoofitness.com/) to see if your question has been answered, or just post it for yourself.

​

prospects.name: I. Boswell 1: Introduction
prospects.description:
It's not every day that Ian Boswell, former World Tour cyclist, and current Pro Gravel Racer, gives you a ring and invites you up to spend the week with him at Siloside, his B&B in Peacham, Vermont, USA. But here you are, ready to learn from, ride with and hang out with the man himself.

​

In this introduction, Ian Boswell shows you around the farmhouse, tells you a little bit about himself, and then sits you down over a coffee to explain what the week ahead holds. Not only will you get in plenty of riding during the week, but Ian will also show you secret swimming holes, how to chop wood, share a few of his favorite meals and buy you one of those ice cream cones he keeps going on about. Above all, he'll share his views on how to achieve a balance between life, work, and sport - a recipe he's successfully applying in the latest chapter of his life.

​

_Schedule for A Week with Ian Boswell:_

_Day 1/7: Introduction & Morning Routine_

_Day 2/7: Strength Endurance_

_Day 3/7: Off_

_Day 4/7: Race Winning Efforts_

_Day 5/7: Creemee Ride_

_Day 6/7: Off_

_Day 7/7: Spikes_

prospects.name: I. Boswell 2: Morning Routine
prospects.description:
Move over, Abi Carver. Ian's taking us up to the top of the barn for his regular morning workout -- a combination of strength, yoga, and some moves that can only be described as Boswellian. So pull out that yoga mat and get ready to move. Feel free to pause the video whenever you like if you want more time with any of the exercises.

​

You will need a foam roller for this workout.

​

_Do this on: Day 1 of the 7-day plan._

prospects.name: I. Boswell 3: Strength Endurance
prospects.description:
When he's riding inside, Ian's a fan of the Sufferfest workouts Power Station and GOAT. So it's no surprise he's taking you on one of his favorite rides: big gear strength efforts on long climbs in the hills around the farmhouse. Not only that, but he's also going to teach you to cut down a tree and stack firewood! What a day!

​

_Do this on: Day 2 of the 7-day plan._

prospects.name: I. Boswell 4: Race Winning Efforts
prospects.description:
You don't win races by just hanging out on the farm. So today, you'll head out with Ian for a quick warm-up and then through a series of intervals with big sprints and sub-threshold efforts. Off-the-bike, Ian's got some treats lined up for you, including his favorite fishing spot and maybe even ice cream if you hit all your workout targets.

​

_Do this on: Day 4 of the 7-day plan._

prospects.name: I. Boswell 5: The Creemee Ride
prospects.description:
It's been great to show you around Siloside, Vermont. Now Ian wants to introduce you to his friends. Actually, he wants you to help him drop his friends. So jump on your bike, head down to the regular Creemee ride, and show the Siloside locals what you're made of on this rolling, rambling ride through the Vermont countryside. Ice cream is on Boz.

​

_Do this on: Day 5 of the 7-day plan._

prospects.name: I. Boswell 6: Spikes
prospects.description:
Good morning! It's straight into the kitchen to make a hearty breakfast with Ian. Then it's outside to get ready for a workout of 3 x 10-minute sub-threshold efforts with 15-second sprints every couple of minutes. In between, you'll learn more about Ian's passion for food and coffee.

​

_Do this on: Day 7 of the 7-day plan._
